verses.text: Clap \w your|strong="H1121"\w* hands, all you peoples: shout \w to|strong="H1121"\w* God \w in|strong="H1121"\w* ringing cries.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* most high \w and|strong="H5971"\w* dread, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* great king \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* subdues \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* feet;

\w he|strong="H7272"\w* chooses \w our|strong="H5971"\w* heritage \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w us|strong="H3816"\w*, \w the|strong="H8478"\w* glory \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Jacob \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H7272"\w* loves. \qs Selah\qs*

God \w is|strong="H5159"\w* gone up \w with|strong="H5159"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shout, \w the|strong="H3290"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w with|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H3290"\w* sound \w of|strong="H1347"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trumpet.

Sing praise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*: sing praise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* king, sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* all earth \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H4428"\w*: \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* God \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skilful \w song|strong="H2167"\w*.

God \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, God sits \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy throne.

Princes \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* gather \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Abraham’s God: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shields \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w are|strong="H1471"\w* God’s; greatly exalted \w is|strong="H3678"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w*.
